title: Good
text: The restaurant is right on the square so its perfect for people watching. Just watch out for the Gypsies even though the waiters kept them away

title: HISTORY
text: Its like Athens History all in one place! It get packed but its all the vibes! Good restaurants, shops, and flea market! Feels like you are in a bazaarin some Arab country. Just be wearing of the Gyspies.. they are all over that Square

title: one word.. AMAZING
text: This little town in full of hidden treasures! and HISTORY. The food is amazing, the restaurants are plenty and clean!

title: Excellent
text: Amazing site and views! There is construction going on to rehab the site but still amazing. Be waring you will have to walk up to the top but its worth it!

title: Awesome
text: The ruins are spectacular, the views excellent and very well taken care of. Just be waring you will have to climb up to the top.

title: Very Nice Musuem
text: Very well curated and easy to navigate. The staff was a little rude but whatever; they didn't matter to me, what mattered was the exhibits. Its not big at all so perfect!

title: Airport to hotel transefr and back
text:
The service was excellent, on time and clean car; practically brand new! Kosta and Nickoli were very professional and superb. They even picked me up at 3AM from hotel to airport.

Will use again on my next trip to Greece!
